artist: Artist: Alex Katz; Printer: John C. Erickson; Publisher: Galerie Bernd Klueser, Munich
creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: blue ink on beige paper; blue background with beige jagged line along bottom (possibly suggests water?); beige bunches of pointed-end marks suggest leaves on top of vertical lines (bamboo or palm fronds?); roughly rectangular shape in middle and right side of image and line sloping diagonally on left side suggest land; edges of paper have slightly rough texture
image_copyright: © Alex Katz %2F Licensed by VAGA at Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C NY
provenance: John C. Erickson, New York; Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil, LLC: Alex Katz
title: Untitled
